required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ntraperitoneal Thermal Perfusion Combined With Chemotherapy Versus Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: Peritoneal Perfusion Chemotherapy Combined With Gemcitabine and Albumin Binding Paclitaxel Versus Gemcitabine and Albumin Binding Paclitaxel in the Treatment of Advanced Pancreatic Cancer With Intraperitoneal Metastasis

brief_summary.textblock: In view of the existence of malignant ascites in patients with advanced pancreatic cancer, we put forward the heat abdominal cavity perfusion chemotherapy combined albumin paclitaxel and gemcitabine compared with albumin paclitaxel and gemcitabine prospective clinical study, to assess abdominal albumin hot perfusion chemotherapy combined control of ascites and taxol in improving patients' quality of life, survival, exploring the feasibility of celiac hot perfusion chemotherapy combined albumin paclitaxel and side effects.

primary_outcome.description: The change of abdominal volume of subjects from enrollment.

arm_group.description: Laparoscopic exploration + thermal perfusion cisplatin 40 mg/m2, Postoperative exploration D1, 8 Nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/m2, GEM 1000 mg/m2, D1, 8, 15 after the second thermal perfusion 4 weeks plan, 6 cycles
Nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/m2, GEM 1000 mg/m2, D1, 8, 15 4 weeks plan, 6 cycles

intervention.description: Laparoscopic exploration + thermal perfusion cisplatin 40 mg/m2, Postoperative exploration D1, 8 Nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/m2, GEM 1000 mg/m2, D1, 8, 15 after the second thermal perfusion 4 weeks plan, 6 cycles
Nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/m2, GEM 1000 mg/m2, D1, 8, 15 4 weeks plan, 6 cycles

facility.name: Department of Pancreatic and Hepatobiliary Surgery, Fudan University Shanghai Cancer Center; Pancreatic Cancer Institute, Fudan University

responsible_party.investigator_title: President of Shanghai Pancreatic Cancer Institute
